channel.title: Announcement! TAG 2017, 6-9 March, Dar es Salaam
channel.description:
We are delighted to announce that the [2017 TAG meeting](http://www.aidtransparency.net/technicaladvisorygroup/tag-meetings/tag-meeting-2017) will be held in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania on 6-9 March 2017.
**How to register for the TAG**
* Complete the [registration form](https://iati.typeform.com/to/Vuajpy) by midnight (GMT) on 18 January 2017. * By 20 January 2017 you’ll receive an email confirming whether you have secured a place, as well as information on the venue and accommodation options etc.
**Useful links**
* [Registration form](https://iati.typeform.com/to/Vuajpy) * [Venue and other practical information](http://www.aidtransparency.net/technicaladvisorygroup/tag-meetings/tag-meeting-2017) (regularly updated) * [Technical Consultation Workshop](http://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/technical-consultation-workshop/533) - papers and discussions

item.title: Announcement! TAG 2017, 6-9 March, Dar es Salaam
item.dc:creator: JoniHillman
item.description:
We are delighted to announce that the 2017 TAG meeting will be held in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania on 6-9 March 2017.

How to register for the TAG

  • Complete the registration form by midnight (GMT) on 18 January 2017.
  • By 20 January 2017 you’ll receive an email confirming whether you have secured a place, as well as information on the venue and accommodation options etc.

Useful links

  • Registration form
  • Venue and other practical information (regularly updated)
  • Technical Consultation Workshop - papers and discussions
